item.title: Leaving Google
item.description: Time flies—almost 9 years have passed since I joined Google. Now the time has come for me to leave and move on. While here, I’m super lucky to mostly work on open source projects that I can publicly talk about. So at the end of my tenure with Google, I’d like to reflect and summarize the incredible journey, which I am super grateful for and thoroughly enjoyed, before I forget some details.
